quote_first: “Either way, he mustn’t be allowed to return to the White House.” The line went dead. Cavalli knew that his father was right on both counts. Cavalli checked his watch again:
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first:
You understand this tape recorder is on?
"Uh huh"
"And it's Wednesday, May 15, at
quote_last:
in the mornin'."
"If you say so"
title: A Time to Kill
author: John Grisham

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
author: Mark Haddon
